thread.title: Rupee up by two paise against dollar in early trade
thread.title_full: Rupee up by two paise against dollar in early trade | Business Standard News

author: Press Trust of India
title: Rupee up by two paise against dollar in early trade
text:
The rupee recovered marginally by two paise to 66.02 against the US dollar in early trade today amid gains in stock markets.

Dealers said a higher opening in the domestic equity market and dollar's weakness against other currencies overseas supported the rupee.

The rupee had recovered 10 paise to close at 66.04 against the US dollar at the Interbank Foreign Exchange yesterday.

Meanwhile, the benchmark Sensex surged 350.94 points, or 1.33%, to 26,582.13 in early trade.
